thread.title: Jerry
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Jerry

author: Jerry
title: Jerry
text:
Katie was incredibly helpful and assisted me in designing a custom ring based one one of their in stock options. I am typically a slow shopper and I like to look over every option and detail before making my final decision. Katie was patient, walked me through the design process and helped me create exactly what I wanted over a couple design revisions. She put all of my worries at ease and never made me feel like I was being demanding. The ring is exactly what I wanted and, most importantly, my fianc√© loves it!
Thank you for the personal service!
